author: mbecke
msg: "Fixes" problem with tunneled HTTPS connections where they can't be reliably reopened from within HttpMethodBase.  Ensures that tunneled HTTPS connections can only be used once.
Reviewed by: Oleg Kalnichevski and Jeff Dever

author: mbecke
msg: Fixed problem when testing with HTTPS.  Replaced "http" literals with getProtocol().

author: olegk
msg: - 'Expect: 100-continue' functions refactored into an abstract ExpectContinueMethod class.
- 'Expect: 100-continue' handshake is not used when sending requests via a proxy
